summary: This mod adds a Poision called Black Lotus Poison to the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a Poision called Black Lotus Poison to the game. It can be "cooked" at the cooking pot.
To cook 2 Black Lotus Poisons you'll need 1 Human Heart, 1 Canis Root and 1 Imp Stool. 
The Poison paralyzes the target for 30 seconds and deals 25 poison damage each second. 

This mod is a tribute to the most known and also best Magic the Gathering Card  called "Black Lotus"
author: Replicant44
